basics.name: Matias Viola
basics.label: Full Stack Developer
basics.summary: I'm a software developer with a strong passion for creating efficient and scalable solutions. I have experience in various areas of software development and am always eager to take on new challenges to enhance my skills.

education.institution: Faculty of Mathematics, Astronomy, Physics, and Computer Science (FAMAF)
education.summary: In the program, I developed a strong foundation in computer science principles, including algorithms, data structures, database management, system design, and system architecture. I also gained proficiency in software development best practices and foundational leadership skills. Additionally, I enhanced my ability to analyze and manipulate symbolic expressions, rigorously define complex problem requirements, and design efficient, reliable software solutions. Practical experience in teamwork allowed me to collaborate effectively with diverse groups, solving complex challenges and delivering impactful results.
education.area: Bachelor's Degree in Computer Science, a Five-Year Program

work.name: Freelance Trading Indicator Developer
work.summary: Developed custom trading indicators for clients on TradingView using Pine Script and Python.
highlights: Successfully developed a wide range of custom indicators based on client requirements.
responsibilities: Worked directly with clients through Meet and Telegram to gather requirements.
Created custom trading indicators in Pine Script for use on TradingView.
Utilized Python for backtesting and additional functionality.
achievements: Delivered tailored solutions, ensuring client satisfaction and accurate trading insights.

projects.name: DB ORM Test Library
projects.summary: A Python library for testing relational databases and ORMs. It captures the database state between two points and compares them to generate complete and accurate tests.
